page.title: 08FARMING. HOLT. WORCS.
page.content: Farming can be divided as follows{A {Cereals }(winter wheat and barley, potatoes, brassicas, parsley, sage, peas, grass-seed sugar beet,(processed at Factory at Kidderminster and transported by road).{FRUIT.} strawberries, raspberries, loganberries, gooseberries. apples, pears. A large percentage of these are sold on a Pick your Own basis the rest being sold in the local produce markets. {GLASS HOUSING }produces lettuce, tomatoes, cucmbers for marketing.{CATTLE}Beef and dairy together with sheep for wool and meat See ATTITUDES for information regarding new crops and the E.E.C..,
